Name: Pavel Ridzik
Details:
Born 2968, died 3029.

The Strategic Military Director of the Capellan Confederation Armed Forces and Duke of Styx, Colonel Pavel Ridzik was promoted to the post two weeks after Maximillian Liao deposed his father Tormax and assumed the rulership of the Confederation. Pavel Ridzik is also the CO of Stapleton's Iron Hand, one of the CCAF's BattleMech regiments.
